game

Class Euchre

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Euchre

  • public class Euchre
extends java.lang.Object
    The Euchre class is our main class that controls the functionality of the game to be played in the console window. It can create a deck and keep track of score as the game is played.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Lawton, Dan Schroeder, Aron Ockerse
